ygData.subject: Re: Trade Help
ygData.msgSnippet: Swarmcaller is one of the top Ranger only 2HS weapons in the game. My sources ( www.maximumeq.com ) say it s worth ~20k.  Those same sources say the Jade Mace
ygData.messageBody:
Swarmcaller is one of the top Ranger only 2HS weapons in the game.
My sources ( www.maximumeq.com ) say it's worth ~20k. Those same
sources say the Jade Mace is worth ~12k. Face value says, no it's
not a good trade. :) But, consider the Jade Mace is the best Bard
wieldable 1HB weapon in the game AND has better dam/delay ratio than
the Symphonic Saber and Harmonic Dagger (without the proc). You'll
do MUCH better with the mace in your primary hand than with a Yak...
Keep the 2 Yaks, "play" with them for a little while, then sell it
off. :) I'd see what else this guy could cough up to even out the
trade a little and take it in a heartbeat. :)

On a similar note - I've acquired an Arbitor's Combine Longsword in a
trade for a Necklace of Superiority. The Stats, 2HS 30/43 +15 Wis
+25 Mana War/Rng/Pal/SK, have Ranger and Pally written all over it.
maximumeq has a value on it at ~30k. I'm trying to work a trade
for "several" high end Bard items, but am having trouble finding
anyone with more than 1, lol. The best I've found so far is Singing
Steel Gaunts and Selo's Drum (I'm trying to get 1 more item out of
her). The person I'm working with thinks the Drum is worth the same
as an FBSS. I had the opportunity (without the cash) to buy a Selo's
Drum for 5k awhile ago... Anyone know a real value on this?

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Cringing at the thought of one more person on Xegony /auction <insert
item here> Looking for Bard Items! :p

> Uhh
> What is a swarmcaller? Stats? No idea what it's worth without
knowing what
> it does ;)
>
> Lyrnia Jongleur - 45 bard - Saryrn
